com.fsc.cicerone.model

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fsc.cicerone.model.BusinessEntity
      • com.fsc.cicerone.model.Language

  • public class Language
extends BusinessEntity
    A language as represented in the system Cicerone. A language is composed by a code and a name and it's identified by its code.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Language.Columns
      A utility class that contains various strings to be used as keys to communicate with the remote server.
